Select a Gallery on your phone.

 Then Shoggle & then Shoggle again!

 (If you don't want to shoggle use the "next" option in the menu.)
Now Shoggle & then Shoggle again!\n\n (If you don\'t want to shoggle use the "next" option in the menu.)
